text: Kintsvisi is a village in Shida Kartli region of the Republic of Georgia, 7.5 km to the southwest from the town of Kareli. A 13th century Kintsvisi Monastery is situated 1.5 km to the southeast. ==References== Закарая, П. (1983) Памятники Восточной Грузии. Искусство, Москва, 376 с. [Zakaraya, P. Monuments of Eastern Georgia](In Russian). Category:Villages in Shida Kartli
title: Kintsvisi, Georgia
